OOC: Cheetor should recognise his form when he turns
around, as his body is identical to his previous one

IC: Shadowcaster turned away from Azure for a minute,
knowing the effects of his virus would kick in any
second, meaning they could get him to a med bay any
minute now.  Making sure his full form could clearly
be seen, he turned to face Cheetor, quietly smiling
"It's been a while little cat."

 --- OMWOS <o_mighty_wife_of_shinigami@...>
wrote: 
---------------------------------
OOC: All righty, bit confused here but trudging ahead

IC: Cheetor shrugged his shoulders, not sure if he
should transform and 
be ready to fight and sat back on his haunches,
watching the Maximal 
now Pred and some stranger. hHe looked up at the
arrival of his leader.

"Big bo-...," the young Maximal trailed off as the
familar nickname he 
had grown acustomed to calling his former leader. He
dropped his head, 
before raising it and continuing. "I'm not sure
Rodimus." 

OMWOS
